pageContent: Purpose: To prospectively determine sexual function, bother, and potency preservation in men treated with prostate brachytherapy and twice-weekly tadalafil.

metaData.source:
Effect of Eischens Yoga During Radiation Therapy on Prostate Cancer Patient Symptoms and Quality of Life: A Randomized Phase II Trial
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28721886/
